text: KCAR-FM (104.3 FM) is an American radio station broadcasting a classic hits format. Licensed to Baxter Springs, Kansas, it serves the greater Joplin, Missouri, area. The station is currently owned by American Media Investments of Pittsburg, Kansas. The station carried an oldies format for many years, until March 12, 2010, when it flipped to comedy as "LOL 104.3." On October 18, 2012, the station flipped to Hot AC, branded as "Star 104.3". On February 1, 2019, the station switched back to a classic hits format branded as "The Rewind on 104.3 FM" Star 104.3 logo from 2012-2019 ==References== ==External links== *The Rewind on 104.3 Website CAR-FM Category:Radio stations established in 2010 Category:Classic hits radio stations in the United States
title: KCAR-FM
